annotator-i18n-welcome: Willkommen bei der Lokalisierungs- und Internationalisierungsdatei der Programmerweiterung Annotator.
annotator-special-intro: Welcome on Semantic Text Annotator Extensions Special Page.
annotate-button-desc: Click here to annotate this article.
annotate-repair-button-desc: Click here to repair moved annotations.
annotate-repair-notification: Not all Annotations could be assigned correctly. Please start the Annotations Repair Mode.
autogenerate-summary: Page was autogenerated by Semantic Text Annotator Extension.
install-description: Please click Install Button before using this Extension.
category-pageform-assignment-description: Here you are able to setup the Annotation Categories used by this Extension. Therefor you have to assign a PageForms Form to any category and select a color.
annotation-main-page-description: This Page shows all Annotations of the Article
repair-welcome-text: In the following steps you are able to correct the moved annotation positions.
repair-annotation-info-text: After clicking Repair you have to select the annotations new position.
repair-all-done-text: Now you will be redirected to the article page.
